Add performance optimizations and benchmarking infrastructure

- Parallelize source downloads using Promise.all for concurrent fetching
- Replace O(nÂ²) splice operations with O(n) filter in CompressTransformation
- Partition exclusion patterns by type (exact/wildcard/regex) for faster matching
- Use Set for O(1) transformation name lookups in TransformationRegistry
- Add --benchmark CLI flag to display compilation performance metrics
- Add Benchmark.ts with Timer and BenchmarkCollector utilities
- Add compileWithMetrics() method to FilterCompiler for optional metrics
- Add comprehensive tests for benchmarking and FilterCompiler (29 new tests)
